Articles.Content: tired of going item by item especially when in sandbox mode, its important to clean up after yourselves if you want to avoid kessler syndrome
Or you could, you know, turn off debris entirely.

design better rockets, minimize your trash-print, and ultimately lead a better space program.

sometimes just getting more skilled is the right way to approach things.

however, a "clear debris" command/button for when muliplayer finally gets added is a definite must. Debris in singleplayer is laughably manageable. But when there's many people in the same universe, then it could get interesting.
I'd be fine with just a "Clear KSC debris" button. Or is this done automatically in 0.24?
I wish there was a "Recover All" option
